comments: Tricia is an excellent instructor. She provided prompt and relevant feedback. Her expertise in the field of instructional design clearly helped students in EDUI 6703: Technology Tools for Online Instruction. She is a true professional. I thoroughly enjoyed her course, EDUI 6703. (NO TEXTBOOK)

She acted like she did not want to be there. No examples or class expectations provided. I hope I NEVER have to take a class from this instructor again

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Very helpful with clear and concise instructions. Relevant assignments with options that are suitable to a variety of interests and abilities. Monitors boards and replies quickly to questions/comments. Grading is very picky as she notes particulars that may not have been specified in assignment description. More feedback would have been nice.
